name: Singles 2: Triple Trouble
summary:
The gameplay is similar to that of the The Sims in that the player is responsible for characters who have to be taken care of, such as by ordering them to eat, sleep, go to work, etc.
Only three characters are ever in the same household. The aim of the game is to get two of them from being casual acquaintances through to having a sexual relationship. There are several characters of either sex with the possibility for a gay/lesbian relationships as well. Another add-on was the ability to visit a nightclub for meeting other singles kiss
info:
• 中文名: 性福人生2:三重烦恼
